description: Fungívoro Perú is a pioneering company focused on mushroom cultivation, aiming to transform organic waste into valuable products for export. Founded as a family initiative, Fungívoro highlights Peru's rich agricultural potential while promoting sustainable practices. By leveraging local resources and addressing the growing demand for mushrooms, Fungívoro seeks to reshape dietary habits and contribute to the global market, showcasing the diverse culinary possibilities of Peruvian fungi.
name: Fungívoro
